about_the_game:
2Week:DeathWorld is a side-scrolling strategy game drawn in dots.
You must defend your base from the zombies that come rushing in at night.

Players explore the stage and gather supplies and friends.
Then, give instructions to your friends, expand your base, and prepare for the attack.
The main objective is to survive for two weeks.

Game over in the middle of the game?
But don't worry.
You can get reinforcement items for each stage you play.
Use the reinforcement items to advance to the next stage of play.

You can also obtain cards when you clear a stage under certain conditions.
There are three types of cards.
Passive cards, which provide various benefits to players.
Building cards, which increase the building menu.
Support cards, which accompany the player and provide benefits.
The player can select up to 6 of these cards in the deck to strategically challenge the stage.


Operation Method

A, D Move
+Shift Dash
W Decision
S Kick
R Reload
SPACE Attack
C Human Resource Management
E Throw a grenade
F Set traps
Esc Pause, menu
(Language can be set from Esc Language)
